snippet.title: DragonHill VR - Trailer - Unreal Engine VR Game Development
snippet.description:
This is a VR Action-adventure game I developed independently with Unreal Engine 4.27.

The game includes a day and night system, a quest and NPC system, a character system, a minimap system, an inventory system, a battle system, and a magic system.
Movement modes include teleportation, smooth motion, swimming and climbing systems.

BGM : Alex-Productions - ICELAND : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kul8V8Y1XlU
